goals.1: Storing all objects in the container.
goals.2: If there is a 1D object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: don't pick and place a box called bin
rules.2: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object first
rules.3: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.4: when a soft object in the bin at the initial state, out of the soft object and replace it into the bin
